title: OSS/BSS Network Engineer Job NEW!
full_description: Job Title OSS/BSS Network Engineer (Telecom Domain) Location Denver, Colorado Duration 6 Months Job DescriptionMust Have Skills (Top 3 technical skills only) * 1. OSS BSS Network component 2. CSP Domain 3. Telecom Domain experience At least 8 years of Telcom domain experience Experience with end to end BSS solution design, ETOM process, Customer journeys Experience in BSS/ OSS COTS packages of Communication Service providers (CSP) Customer, Order Management, CPQ, Product Catalog, Service Orchestration & Service Inventory, Billing, Fraud Management, Revenue Assurance. Knowledge in Java/J2ee will be good. Experience and desire to work in a Global delivery environment. Experience and desire to work in a management consulting environment that requires regular travel 3 7 years experience in CSP Domain - preferably with exposure to MVNO,MNO,4G, 5GRegards,Rocky Singh Staffing HeadDirect Line: 609-357-9412 / 609-357-9406 Ext: 107 | Email: Rocky@itbtalent.comwww.itbrainiac.comPrinceton Forrestal Village, 116 Village Blvd, Suite 200, Princeton, NJ 08540, USA.Do reply back with REMOVE on top of this email if you don't want to receive emails from my side
